Dear Sir,

I refer to the subject survey carried out at M/s Chalhoub Warehouse, Al Quoz Ind Area 1, Dubai, UAE, on 31st July 2025.

Based on our inspection, 16 Cartons containing 82 pairs of shoes were noted, segregated subjected to wet damage and mechanical damage.

Basis our physical inspection of segregated cargo following our observations and recommendations:

Damage type

Qty in pairs

Observations

Recommendation

Wetness

NOTICE OF DAMAGE/LOSS

Date-23.07.2025

For the shipment under AWB    176-19770446

Goods: General cargo

Best Regards
